blogPost.excerpt: eProduct is and evidence-based product management software to hep you build customer driven products based on market evidence, reach market fit quicker and drive revenue. single platform to UNDERSTAND, MANAGE & LAUNCH products users need.
blogPost.body: eProduct is and evidence-based product management software to hep you build customer driven products based on market evidence, reach market fit quicker and drive revenue. single platform to UNDERSTAND, MANAGE & LAUNCH products users need.
blogPost.title: eProduct.io - Evidence-based Product Management Software
blogPost.author: ADIL BERDAI

localize.description: eProduct是一款基于证据的产品管理软件，它能帮助您根据市场证据建立客户驱动的产品，更快地达到市场契合度并提高收入。
localize.tagline: 基于证据的产品管理软件

localize.description: eProduct是一款基於證據的產品管理軟件，它能幫助您根據市場證據建立客戶驅動的產品，更快地達到市場契合度並提高收入。
localize.tagline: 基於證據的產品管理軟件

previous.title:
You always hear about the person who paid 10,000 Bitcoin for a couple of pizzas. What about the person on the other side of that transaction?

Those coins are now worth almost $400 million.

localize.full_text:
你总是听说有人花了1万比特币买了几个披萨。那交易的另一方的人呢？

这些币现在价值近4亿美元。

你總是聽說有人花了1萬比特幣買了幾個披薩。那交易的另一方的人呢？

這些幣現在價值近4億美元。

next.excerpt: Hacker Memo is a simple memo app that pursues "coolness". The design is based on the image of science fiction and spy movies such as "The Matrix" and "007".
next.title: HackerMemo -  The coolest memo app for sci-fi lovers

localize.description: 黑客备忘录是一款追求 "酷 "的简单备忘录应用。设计以《黑客帝国》、《007》等科幻、谍战电影的形象为基础。
localize.tagline: 最酷的备忘录应用，适合科幻爱好者使用。

localize.description: 黑客備忘錄是一款追求 "酷 "的簡單備忘錄應用。設計以《黑客帝國》、《007》等科幻、諜戰電影的形象爲基礎。
localize.tagline: 最酷的備忘錄應用，適合科幻愛好者使用。
